# volume

**Instance Property**

The bus’s input volume.

## Declaration

```swift
var volume: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `1.0`, and the range of valid values is `0.0` to `1.0`. Only the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioEnvironmentNode] and the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioMixerNode] implement this property.
title: volume
